languages.text: "Ваша похвала уже бесценный дар, и как верной слуге династии мне не пристало желать большего". {n}Из-под прикрытых ресниц сверкает лукавый огонек.{/n} "Но было бы верхом неучтивости отвергать ваше великодушие".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша похвала уже бесценный дар, и как верной слуге династии мне не пристало желать большего". {n}Из-под прикрытых ресниц сверкает лукавый огонек.{/n} "Но было бы верхом неучтивости отвергать ваше великодушие".

languages.text: "Your praise alone is a priceless gift, and as a faithful servant of the dynasty, I must not desire anything more." {n}A coy spark lights up in her half-closed eyes.{/n} "And yet it would be a grave discourtesy on my part to reject your generosity."
languages.original_text: "Ваша похвала уже бесценный дар, и как верной слуге династии мне не пристало желать большего". {n}Из-под прикрытых ресниц сверкает лукавый огонек.{/n} "Но было бы верхом неучтивости отвергать ваше великодушие".

traits.locale_text: "Your praise alone is a priceless gift, and as a faithful servant of the dynasty, I must not desire anything more." {n}A coy spark lights up in her half-closed eyes.{/n} "And yet it would be a grave discourtesy on my part to reject your generosity."

"Your praise alone is a priceless gift, and as a faithful servant of the dynasty, I must not desire anything more." {n}A coy spark lights up in her half-closed eyes.{/n} "And yet it would be a grave discourtesy on my part to reject your generosity."

"Your praise alone is a priceless gift, and as a faithful servant of the dynasty, I must not desire anything more." {n}A coy spark lights up in her half-closed eyes.{/n} "And yet it would be a grave discourtesy on my part to reject your generosity."

"Your praise alone is a priceless gift, and as a faithful servant of the dynasty, I must not desire anything more." {n}A coy spark lights up in her half-closed eyes.{/n} "And yet it would be a grave discourtesy on my part to reject your generosity."

"Your praise alone is a priceless gift, and as a faithful servant of the dynasty, I must not desire anything more." {n}A coy spark lights up in her half-closed eyes.{/n} "And yet it would be a grave discourtesy on my part to reject your generosity."

"Your praise alone is a priceless gift, and as a faithful servant of the dynasty, I must not desire anything more." {n}A coy spark lights up in her half-closed eyes.{/n} "And yet it would be a grave discourtesy on my part to reject your generosity."

languages.text: « Vos compliments sont à eux seuls une récompense inestimable, et en tant que fidèle servante de votre dynastie, je ne demande rien de plus. » {n}Une lueur de fausse timidité transparaît dans ses yeux mi-clos.{/n} « Pour autant, ce serait terriblement discourtois de ma part que de rejeter votre générosité. »
languages.original_text: "Your praise alone is a priceless gift, and as a faithful servant of the dynasty, I must not desire anything more." {n}A coy spark lights up in her half-closed eyes.{/n} "And yet it would be a grave discourtesy on my part to reject your generosity."

traits.locale_text: « Vos compliments sont à eux seuls une récompense inestimable, et en tant que fidèle servante de votre dynastie, je ne demande rien de plus. » {n}Une lueur de fausse timidité transparaît dans ses yeux mi-clos.{/n} « Pour autant, ce serait terriblement discourtois de ma part que de rejeter votre générosité. »

languages.text: «Sus alabanzas son un regalo indescriptible, como fiel sirviente de la dinastía no deseo nada más». {n}Se percibe una chispa coqueta en sus ojos entreabiertos.{/n} «Aunque, claro, sería toda una falta de cortesía rechazar su generosidad».
languages.original_text: "Your praise alone is a priceless gift, and as a faithful servant of the dynasty, I must not desire anything more." {n}A coy spark lights up in her half-closed eyes.{/n} "And yet it would be a grave discourtesy on my part to reject your generosity."

traits.locale_text: «Sus alabanzas son un regalo indescriptible, como fiel sirviente de la dinastía no deseo nada más». {n}Se percibe una chispa coqueta en sus ojos entreabiertos.{/n} «Aunque, claro, sería toda una falta de cortesía rechazar su generosidad».

languages.text: 「あなたに褒められるのは光栄なことで、王朝の忠実な下僕として、これ以上望むことはありません」{n}半分閉じた瞳に、いたずらな輝きが宿る。{/n}「それでも、あなたの寛大さを拒絶するのは、私にとって重大な非礼でしょう」
languages.original_text: "Your praise alone is a priceless gift, and as a faithful servant of the dynasty, I must not desire anything more." {n}A coy spark lights up in her half-closed eyes.{/n} "And yet it would be a grave discourtesy on my part to reject your generosity."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたに褒められるのは光栄なことで、王朝の忠実な下僕として、これ以上望むことはありません」{n}半分閉じた瞳に、いたずらな輝きが宿る。{/n}「それでも、あなたの寛大さを拒絶するのは、私にとって重大な非礼でしょう」

languages.text: “您的赞美是无价之宝。身为王朝忠实的仆人，我不敢奢望这样的嘉奖。”{n}她半闭的双眼中闪烁着羞怯的火花。{/n}“不过，若是我拒绝了您的慷慨，那就实在是太不敬了。”
languages.original_text: "Your praise alone is a priceless gift, and as a faithful servant of the dynasty, I must not desire anything more." {n}A coy spark lights up in her half-closed eyes.{/n} "And yet it would be a grave discourtesy on my part to reject your generosity."

traits.locale_text: “您的赞美是无价之宝。身为王朝忠实的仆人，我不敢奢望这样的嘉奖。”{n}她半闭的双眼中闪烁着羞怯的火花。{/n}“不过，若是我拒绝了您的慷慨，那就实在是太不敬了。”

languages.text: "Allein Euer Lob ist ein kostbares Geschenk, und als treue Dienern der Dynastie darf ich nicht mehr verlangen." {n}Ein schwacher Funke blitzt in ihren halb geschlossenen Augen auf.{/n} "Und doch wäre es ausgesprochen ungebührlich, Euer großzügiges Angebot auszuschlagen."
languages.original_text: "Your praise alone is a priceless gift, and as a faithful servant of the dynasty, I must not desire anything more." {n}A coy spark lights up in her half-closed eyes.{/n} "And yet it would be a grave discourtesy on my part to reject your generosity."

traits.locale_text: "Allein Euer Lob ist ein kostbares Geschenk, und als treue Dienern der Dynastie darf ich nicht mehr verlangen." {n}Ein schwacher Funke blitzt in ihren halb geschlossenen Augen auf.{/n} "Und doch wäre es ausgesprochen ungebührlich, Euer großzügiges Angebot auszuschlagen."

languages.text: "Takdiriniz, başlı başına paha biçilemez bir hediyedir. Hanedanlığın sadık bir hizmetkârı olarak daha fazlasını arzulayamam." {n}Kısık gözlerinde mağrur bir kıvılcım çakıyor.{/n} "Yine de cömertliğinizi reddetmek, benim açımdan ciddi bir nezaketsizlik göstergesi olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Your praise alone is a priceless gift, and as a faithful servant of the dynasty, I must not desire anything more." {n}A coy spark lights up in her half-closed eyes.{/n} "And yet it would be a grave discourtesy on my part to reject your generosity."
